item.name: config
item.item: Related business types are shown to customers the business types relating to the article.

item.name: config
item.item: Related service providers are shown to customers the service providers relating to the article.

item.name: config
item.item: Related toots and templates are shown to customers the tools and templates relating to the article.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave blank to use Meta Title by default.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave blank to use Meta Description by default.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave blank to use Featured Image by default. Allow image type: jpg, jpeg, gif, png.

item.name: config
item.item: Leave blank to use "article" type by default.

item.name: config
item.item: Related articles are shown to customers in addition to the item the customer is looking at.

item.name: config
item.item: Related products are shown to customers in addition to the item the customer is looking at.
